title: Star Watch Face
summary: Star Wear Watch Face puts a magic world on your wrist.
description: Watch Face - Star Trek on Wear puts a magic world on your wrist. There are twelve different themes in the watch face. They are not just simply background. Once the screen turns on, you will be amazed by the magic animation.Customization✔ 12 themes to choose✔  Weather Location✔  Temperature unit✔  Weather update frequency✔  Date format custimizaiton✔  Color custimizaitonFeatures:✔ Three different themes to choose✔ Date✔ Weather ✔ Digital Time ✔ Round & Square Watch Face✔ Concise & Power saving✔ Supported watches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch 3, Motorola Moto 360,  LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatch
descriptionHTML:
Watch Face - Star Trek on Wear puts a magic world on your wrist. There are twelve different themes in the watch face. They are not just simply background. Once the screen turns on, you will be amazed by the magic animation.

Customization
✔ 12 themes to choose
✔ Weather Location
✔ Temperature unit
✔ Weather update frequency
✔ Date format custimizaiton
✔ Color custimizaiton

Features:
✔ Three different themes to choose
✔ Date
✔ Weather
✔ Digital Time
✔ Round & Square Watch Face
✔ Concise & Power saving
✔ Supported watches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch 3, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatch
comments: Just perfect, it's so coo. There is only one thing, you should add an option to disable animations, both of them of just one (only touch or only the other).
To the publishers Nicely designed faces, only thing for those of us who notice the PM indicator, the leading "0" in the time in 12hr mode is not needed
I like it. Not much info but looks nice and works.
Calendar Bugs Please fix! Year did not change to 2016...still shows 2015.
I love the face!I would like a red version of the last one!(The vortex thingy)
Please add more customization options on this watch face, such like colors and wedgits.
